Configuration de la Politique

# juridique-secret-policy.yml
security:
  sandbox: strict
  network: blocked  # isolation r√©seau absolue ‚Äî aucun appel API
  allowed_endpoints: []
  pii_redaction:
    enabled: true
    patterns: [nir, email, adresse, telephone, code_client, numero_dossier]
    mode: aggressive
  budget:
    max_cost_per_run: 0.50
    currency: EUR
  audit:
    merkle_chain: true
    export_format: jsonl
    retention_days: 3650  # 10 ans ‚Äî support mise en √©tat
  constraints:
    privilege_check: mandatory
    network_access: blocked_at_kernel
